body.name: Mini Projector, Aokang 7500 Lumens HD Portable Projector (white)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 10 mins
features: [Compact & Portable Projector Design] After deep research we find most customers would prefer to have a small-size projector, so we have launched this mini projector. The Palm-Size mini projector is easy to carry and operate, with the noticeable modern industrial and streamlined humanization design, you will have enjoyable and unbelievable moments upon watching videos/movies/football games in the backyard or playing video games at home. It worth your try and never disappoint you.

[Advanced Short Focal Lens] Compared with the other ordinary projectors on the market, this portable projector is equipped with the most advanced Short-Focal-Lens, which means you will get much bigger and better image size at the same projection distance. The recommended projection distance is 2 - 3 meters and the projection size is 70 - 100 inch. Besides, this projector supports various installation methods, you can put it on a tripod for easy movement, or install it under the ceiling.

[Higher Enhanced Performance] Do not be fooled by its Palm-Size appearance, this portable projector is featured with 30% increased brightness compared to other 4 inch projectors. With it’s fabulous 480P native resolution and 1080P full HD support, excellent 3000:1 contrast ratio and latest 5.0 LCD display technology, you will get a real, dynamic and color vibrant projection image quality. Order now and have a great portable TV that can be transferred to any area of the house with ease.

[Connection With Most Devices] This projector is featured with multiple ports including HDMI, USB, and AV interface. It's the perfect solution for a wide variety of inputs including but not limited to TV Stick/Box, Game Console, PCs & Laptops, DVD player, and USB Sticks, External Speaker etc. It's also easy to connect Smart phone, Tablets, and Macs to this video projector and enjoy large screen viewing experience, but you’ll need to buy an additional adapter that’s not included in the package.

[Hi-Fi Sound & Lower Noise] This portable video projector produces clear, crisp and loud sound with its built-in 3W/8Ohm speaker for indoor use. And you can connect it to external speaker when using the projector outdoors. The innovative and efficient cooling system empowers a stunning watching and listening experience by decreasing 80% fan noise. This is in addition to the easy to adjustable focus and keystone correction function.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our product is dedicated to develop fantastic mini home projectors and provide the be-st af-ter sa-le ser-vice. Innovation, quality and professionalism are the three words that best summarize our brand. We spend much in technological innovation, use the best materials, hire professional staff to produce quality item, provide timely and useful af-ter sa-le ser-vice.

Make Your Own Home Theater, Enjoy Family Time: Are you still going to the cinema, or you would prefer to watch movies in your spare time especially at night when all your family members are complete? This mini portable projector for indoor & outdoor movies is super easy to set up, featured with multiple ports including HDMI, USB, AV etc to support variety kinds of devices and movies, it’s the best choice for home & outdoor entertainments.

How to Screen Mirror Your Smartphone & Tablet: Remember they needs to be connected via the HDMI port, instead of the USB port, so you need to use a convert adapter which is not included in the package. IOS devices: Original Lightning to HDMI adapter Android devices: Goo-gle Chrome-cast HDMI adapter Then Select “HD” as the signal source and press “OK” button. Wait 2-3 seconds, the projector will sync your phones screen. Due to the HDCP copyright protection, Netflix, Amazon-Prime, Disney-Plus, and Hu-lu streaming is not supported when you are mirroring screen your smartphones or tablets. But you could play those Apps via PC/Laptop, or TV Box & sticks connection.

Enhanced Performance with +30% Brightness This projector is featured with advanced short-focal lens and latest 5.0 LCD display technology, thus increasing the brightness 30% higher compared to other 4 inch mini projectors on the market. To get the best projection image quality, we suggest you to use this projector in a dark room or environment. Compact & Portable Projector Design This fantastic projector has a small size , weighs only 1.98 pounds, with an unique strip in the lower left corner, making it much easier and more convenient to move the unit around. It also comes with a foot to raise the projector up and a scr-ew hole to install the tripod, offering you more flexibility to place the projector anywhere. Hi-Fi Sound & Lower Noise Built in 3W/8Ohm speaker, this tiny projector produces clear and well balanced sound for indoor use. And you can also connect it to external speaker which is easily hooked up with a headphone out jack for outdoor use. The low noise cooling system empowers a stunning watching and listening experience by decreasing 80% fan noise.

Mobile TV Supports Various TV Shows This projector is the perfect solution for TV signal inputs includes but not limited to TV Stick/Box, and can be set up at your will. Enjoy your mobile TV shows at the ideal 120inch large screen without any copyright issues. Flexible Multi-Media Connection It's also possible to connect this video projector with Game Console, PCs, Laptops, DVD players, and USB stick to enjoy movies, pictures, TV shows, games, etc. The included HDMI cable and AV cable makes it super easy to achieve the connection. Easy to Operate & Install This projector features with easy to adjustable focus and keystone correction. Rolls the zoom lens and wheel until the projection image is sharp and in focus. The featured image flip function is a perfect solution for different mounting position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiny Power Packed Entertainment
reviews.reviewText: This TINY projector is AMAZING. I highly recommend it for indoor or outdoor movie night!The picture is clear adjusters are on the top of the projector to tilt or change the picture.The sound isn’t bad although I would recommend a speaker.It’s PERFECT if you need to travel with it and fits on a tripod stand which we have already. We used a 120 out door blow up screen and the picture was awesome (can’t see there). With the sound you would have thought you were at a drive up. In the house it worked on the wall great as you can see! Picture is great!Picture is bright reflects well with whatever device used. We used a firestick but it comes with a remote( you need batteries),USB port, hdmi cable, plug for projector, av cords. This device is not Bluetooth.It’s TINY and fabulous we love this item!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a cheap projector to use for outdoor movie nights. It's blown me away. The projector has a really good picture quality. There's sound but I prefer to use a bluetooth speaker so I have more base and can make it louder. This is easy to connect to. My biggest issue is the bluetooth connecting to my computer. It works great with my phone so it might just be a computer connectivity issue. Other than that, I love this projector and will be using it more often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Picture Quality
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't expecting a ton from this projector, as the price was quite low. It's not a "smart" unit, so you'll need to provide your own Roku stick or Amazon fire stick or something similar if you want to use it to watch streaming media. The USB port doesn't provide enough power to power my amazon fire stick, which was frustrating - as now I have to run power from the projector AND from the fire stick into the wall. The picture quality is pretty good though, and it is plenty bright enough for me - however I only really use it in the evening. In a bright room, this wouldn't work very well.The fan is quite loud unfortunately, so you have to have the volume up a decent level to hear anything clearly. Also, it puts out quite a bit of heat.With all that said, I'm still happy with the value for the dollar. All of those items could be fixed simply by spending a little bit more, but for the super low price I paid for this, it works just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A fantastic choice for anyone looking for a projector within a budget
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. - the audio is pleasantly clear and loud- the fan is definitely among the quietest that I've heard, but not completely gone which is to be expected for a projector at this price point- definitely portable; the projector is still smaller than my small hands- no overheating as long as it is ventilated; I was able to connect the projector to a stand that I already had and the projector never gets any hotter than warm even after a few hours of use- the picture quality isn't as clear as I would typically want; there are less pixels per inch compared to another projector that I currently have, but honestly it's not that big of a deal since it isn't that obvious unless you're sitting super close to the screen, besides that though the screen is very bright (I also apologize for the video attached—my phone was having trouble focusing resulting in some blurry moments)- I like the design of the remote and the program of the projector itself is easy to navigateSummary:This projector is ideal for use in smaller spaces and traveling. I would 10/10 recommend this projector to anyone that has a budget that can't be broken. Although not the best projector you can find, it is definitely one of the best that you can find at its price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY
reviews.reviewText: the instruction book it comes with does not even go with the projector i ordered but with a different model instead. tell me how am i expected set up the projector with a manual that doesn’t even go with the TMY i ordered? there were four options on the screen which were movie, music, settings, and camera roll but the only one it would allow you to click was settings. in the settings there were only about 10 options and all were to do with the look of the projection and not to set up or connect to an iphone or anything. after spending about an hour looking for some way to connect to wi-fi or to connect to our phones we took a break. then when we went to turn it on again IT WOULDNT TURN ON. and it never did turn back on so even if we had found some way to connect it to wi-fi it would have been for nothing since it stopped working after being turned off once.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's missing a cord to hook it up to a computer or phone.
reviews.reviewText: It's missing a cord that hooks up to the computer or to a phone but other then that my brother was able to hook it up to his Nintendo switch, clear picture and easy to adjust.

reviews.reviewerName: Wasn’t sure how ut was really going to look when I ordered this.  It came and tiara is very durable the sash had to be laid out to get bends out
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size, perfect price
reviews.reviewText: We didn’t want anything big or expensive it works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little projector
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This projector is everything as advertised. The picture is great, it’s compact, and works with a variety of inputs. Very happy with this projector.Review:Shipping - It came in an Amazon box in less than 3 days. It was very well packaged with bubble plastic and very secure."So all in all very pleased with shipping 5/5.Build - Solid! There is a white hard plastic exterior with a slight Matt finish. With a nice slick top plastic piece by the knobs that adjust picture quality "ref pic". The Remote seems okay not the best but serviceable. If it ever broke there is a manual set of buttons on top. Glad to see an included HDMI and RCA cable.Overall 5/5Viewing - AMAZING! twist of the knob and it's in perfect focus. Easy as that. The sound in okay but won't blow anyone away. It was to be expected since the projector itself is small. Attach an external speaker and you will be good to go.Dont wait! Dont double guess! Get it!
Encendía pero no proyectaba nada. Lo regresé y me reembolsados el total de mi pago.
